name: Tennis For 4
description:
remember Tennis For Two? me neither, but think if there was a Tennis For Four or T44 for the  friends.

 Now play this game with an oldschool esthetic, based on Pong, the physics of Tennis For Two and four player to make the joke, and also the chaos of party games.

 You can play with 4 friends or you alone with some dumb artificial inteligences(they use the same code of touch controls), play with a keyboard, your mouse or your fingers(if you have a touch pc beacause i can't compile the game for html)
